Method Detail

exec

public static void exec(java.lang.String language,
                        java.lang.String script,
                        int eventCompressionKey)
Executes the specified script in the interpreter of the specified language. Use this version of exec() to store script events which are compressible by some unique key (typically an index of something in GlobalObjects can be used). This means that when the state of the system is stored, only the last scripts executed with each key are stored. This should only be used when executing the script overwrites the effect of the previous script executed with the same key.

Parameters:
language - the language specifying the interpreter to use
script - the script to execute
eventCompressionKey -

execfile

public static void execfile(java.lang.String path)
Executes the file at the specified file path. The interpreter used to interpret the file depends on the file extension

Parameters:

importIfNotDefined

public static void importIfNotDefined(java.lang.String language,
                                      java.lang.Class<?> classToImport)
Imports the specified Java class in the interpreter of the specified language if the class is not already defined.

Parameters:
language - the language of the interpreter to import the class in
classToImport - the class to import.
